detaileddescription.para: Indicates that this map tool performs a transient (one-off) operation. If it does, the tool can be operated once and then a previous map tool automatically restored.

briefdescription.para: Map tool is an edit tool, which can only be used when layer is editable.
Allow zooming by rectangle (by holding shift and dragging) while the tool is active.
Enumeration of flags that adjust the way the map tool operates.
optionally map tool can have pointer to action which will be used to set that action as active
optionally map tool can have pointer to a button which will be used to set that action as active
pointer to map canvas
cursor used in map tool
translated name of the map tool
Returns associated action with map tool or NULL if no action is associated.
called when set as currently active map tool
Returns associated button with map tool or NULL if no button is associated.
returns pointer to the tool's map canvas
Mouse double-click event for overriding. Default implementation does nothing.
Mouse move event for overriding. Default implementation does nothing.
Mouse press event for overriding. Default implementation does nothing.
Mouse release event for overriding. Default implementation does nothing.
convenient method to clean members
called when map tool is being deactivated
Returns the flags for the map tool.
gesture event for overriding. Default implementation does nothing.
Returns if the current map tool active on the map canvas.
Key event for overriding. Default implementation does nothing.
Key event for overriding. Default implementation does nothing.
Use this to associate a QAction to this maptool.

detaileddescription.para: Then when the setMapTool method of mapcanvas is called the action state will be set to on. Usually this will cause e.g. a toolbutton to appear pressed in and the previously used toolbutton to pop out.

briefdescription.para: Use this to associate a button to this maptool.

detaileddescription.para: It has the same meaning as setAction() function except it works with a button instead of an QAction.

briefdescription.para: Sets a user defined cursor.
Emit map tool changed with the old tool.
Mouse wheel event for overriding. Default implementation does nothing.
Gets search radius in mm.

detaileddescription.para:
Used by identify, tip etc. The values is currently set in identify tool options (move somewhere else?) and defaults to Qgis::DEFAULT_SEARCH_RADIUS_MM.
QGIS 2.3

briefdescription.para: Gets search radius in map units for given context.

detaileddescription.para:
Used by identify, tip etc. The values is calculated from searchRadiusMM().
QGIS 2.3

briefdescription.para: Gets search radius in map units for given canvas.

detaileddescription.para:
Used by identify, tip etc. The values is calculated from searchRadiusMM().
QGIS 2.3

briefdescription.para: signal emitted once the map tool is activated
signal emitted once the map tool is deactivated
emit signal to clear previous message
emit a message
clear pointer when action is destroyed
constructor takes map canvas as a parameter
transformation from map coordinates to screen coordinates
transformation from screen coordinates to layer's coordinates
transformation from map coordinates to layer's coordinates
trnasformation of the rect from map coordinates to layer's coordinates
transformation from screen coordinates to map coordinates
transformation from layer's coordinates to map coordinates (which is different in case reprojection is used)
transformation from layer's coordinates to map coordinates (which is different in case reprojection is used)

simplesect.para: available in Python bindings as toMapCoordinatesV2

briefdescription.para: Abstract base class for all map tools.

detaileddescription.para: Map tools are user interactive tools for manipulating the map canvas. For example map pan and zoom features are implemented as map tools.
